message.body: i would like to see a youtube clone where you can watch videos from popular services like youtube and vimeo and then choose to host the video in a distributed fashion
why is that?
i see, i was thinking it would be easier to get people on board with a censorship-free video service that still had all the content that youtube does
i know youtube-dl
I've played around with youtube-dl, but I'm really not a web dev
what i was thinking is that the first person to watch the video on zeronet would download and start seeding it
it wouldn't look like a bot if it was in the pattern people normally watch videos, right?
i don't know how those video downloader scripts actually work so i wouldn't know
yeah so you want to have a p2p streaming site, but for people to get into it you need content, so why not just take content from youtube and start hosting it p2p as people want to see it?
sure rythrix
is it rare?  you can just name it if you want
it is free, thanks! i should get back to work now, it's been cool
